articles.author: Jake Boxall-Legge
articles.title: Ranked: The 10 F1 teams at the 2024 Chinese GP - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Just as it looked like Ferrari was beginning to tighten its stranglehold on the lesser Formula 1 title of "best of the rest", McLaren and Lando Norris surprised in China.
articles.content: Max Verstappen dominated once again, having hinted at his clear advantage in pace during Saturday's sprint race, but it did not go all Red Bull's own way as Sergio Perez was leapfrogged in the stops.… [+8316 chars]
